How You're Treated Affects How You Feel
Our team believes that healthcare is better when it's built on relationships, trust, collaboration, and understanding.
Ian Horner: Family man, family physician
Relationship-based care helps people live their healthiest
Get the latest health news from The Portland Clinic
COVID-19 Response — The Portland Clinic is open and equipped to provide safe, quality care for the community. Learn more >>
With more than 30 areas of practice, we provide comprehensive care for every member of your family.

Our providers develop strong ongoing relationships with our patients, tending to health issues as they arise, conducting yearly exams educating about prevention and making referrals to other specialists when necessary.
We take a thoughtful look at family history, genetics, behaviors and more in order to best diagnose, treat and set preventive standards for our patients.
Primary Care physicians are the quarterbacks of the medical profession, identifying problems and making referrals to specialists when necessary.
Our expert internal medicine doctors have a deep understanding of diagnostics, long-term care, preventive medicine and more, to treat your body in its entirety.
We view health in context of the whole person and whole family, emphasizing prevention and education and developing sound bodies and healthy habits for a lifetime.
Our broad array of specialists work closely with our entire team to ensure that patients get the premium care and personal service they deserve.
Audiologists specialize in the diagnosis and treatment of hearing and balance disorders.
We manage the full spectrum of cardiovascular conditions, working closely with physicians and specialists to provide comprehensive care.
Our Dermatology experts treat a range of skin conditions from simple blisters to life-threatening conditions.
From ankle or foot trauma to bunions to arthritis, our specialists focus on the most up-to-date and eﬀective treatments.
We provide clinical services related to diseases of the digestive tract, liver and pancreas, including colonoscopy, gastroscopy, biopsy, polypectomy, etc.
We specialize in women’s health and issues concerning the reproductive system, focusing exclusively on our patients’ needs outside of pregnancy.
Our providers have in-depth training and expertise in the diagnosis and treatment of illnesses caused by bacteria, viruses, fungi, and parasites.
This specialty deals with the musculoskeletal system, especially relating to the spine – and we bring a comprehensive approach to your care.
We oﬀer comprehensive diagnosis and treatment of primary kidney diseases, diabetic kidney disease, genetic kidney diseases, hypertension and more.
We diagnose and treat conditions related to the brain, spinal cord and the autonomic nervous system, as well as the blood vessels and muscles related to these structures.
From prescribing glasses to corrective surgeries, our ophthalmologists, optometrists and opticians treat your eye care as though it were their own.
Our experts treat a wide range of injuries, including accidents, sports-related injuries, aging and problems that may arise from congenital causes.
The Otolaryngologists at The Portland Clinic oﬀer a wide range of treatments for conditions of the ear, nose and throat.
Treating arthritis, vasculitis or other musculoskeletal diseases, we aim to keep you healthy and pain-free, by providing expert progressive care.
Treating diseases and conditions of the urinary system, we combine up-to-date techniques and tools with a caring and understanding approach.
The Portland Clinic team provides a range of services that help our patients achieve and maintain healthy, happy lives.
Our expert team provides surgical care for procedures that do not require an overnight hospital stay.
Partnership with the Oregon Anesthesiology Group helps us provide expert anesthesia care in our day surgery centers.
Staﬀed by registered nurses specially trained in anticoagulation therapy, we help patients manage medications like Warfarin, Pradaxa, Xarelto and Eliquis.
We focus on areas that require ongoing attention and nurturing, including your body, your mind, and your spirit.
Our pharmacy works closely with your healthcare providers to ensure medications are safe and appropriate, and your questions are answered.
Our comprehensive diabetes program provides patients with specialists, expert consultants and classes to eﬀectively manage diabetes.
Our dietitians provide the information and tools needed to help patients establish a lifestyle of eating and exercise that supports their health.
We work hard to help you regain and build skills for independent functioning and living to enhance your quality of life.
Reducing pain and improving range of motion, strength, stability, and ﬂexibility are our focus in the treatment of physical disorders.
We are experts in various imaging modalities including CT, MRI, ultrasound, bone densitometry, mammography, and radiography.
We oﬀer take-home sleep tests, overnight sleep studies, consultations, diagnosis and treatment (including CPAP) for all types of sleep disorders.
Our specialists are highly trained in identifying and treating concussions; serious injuries that often go unrecognized and undertreated.
Our travel clinics in Portland and Beaverton provide up-to-date vaccines for business, leisure and educational travel.
Physicians are available to treat conditions, after normal business hours, that require prompt medical attention, but are not life-threatening.

COVID-19 Response — The Portland Clinic is open and equipped to provide safe, quality care for the community. Learn more >>
Connect with us at one of our Portland-area locations.
By appointment only due to COVID-19. Please call 503-223-3113 to schedule.

Urgent Care, including X - ray:   Mon - Friday 8 a.m. - 8 p.m., Sat 9 a.m. - 5 p.m.
You do not have to be a Portland Clinic patient to use our Urgent Care. Urgent Care treats conditions that require prompt medical attention, but are not life-threatening.

Parking at all of our facilities is conveniently located right next to the buildings. There is a small per-hour charge for parking at our downtown location. Our Beaverton, Northeast, South and Tigard locations provide free parking.
